incidents.name: Degradation of Outbound Call Answer Rates

incident_updates.body: Lower/no attestation signing for outgoing calls has been resolved and attestation signing is operating normally at this time.

Attestation signing for outgoing calls is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue in call degradation impacting outbound call answer rates. End users receiving voice calls may not be signed, thus calls may not be rightly attested, calls would still complete without issues. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with outbound voice call answer rates. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: JWT Authentication Throwing 500s From Invalid Keys

incident_updates.body: Scoped Auth Service was degraded for 2 minutes between 9:41 and 9:43 Pacific Time on 02/03/2023. During this period, customers may have experienced 500s instead of 401s. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery report Issue to Multiple Networks In Australia

incident_updates.body: We experienced an issue with SMS delivery reports to Multiple Networks In Australia, but the actual SMS delivery was not impacted. The issue occurred between 02:09 PM PT and 10:18 PM PT Jan 31 Pacific Time. During this period, customers may have noticed error code 30005 but the SMS were delivered. Our Engineering team has identified the issue and has already implemented the necessary changes.

incidents.name: Messaging Inbound Webhook cookies experienced an incident

incident_updates.body: Messaging Inbound Webhook cookies experienced a small downtime starting from Jan 31st 01:14 am PST until Jan 31st 01:25 am PST. During the incident around 1% of messages had problems with persisting new cookies and retrieving previous cookies for inclusion in the customer webhooks.

incidents.name: Our Engineers are Investigating an Issue with Degradation of Service on Studio

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the degradation of service on Studio issue triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that there is no noticeable customer impact. All systems are operational.
We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Studio was degraded for 5 minutes between 3:27 PM and 3:31 PM Pacific Time on 01/30/2023.  During this period, customers may have experienced missed calls, dropped messages, and otherwise failed executions. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Flex Insights Historical Reporting Degraded

incident_updates.body: Flex Insights historical reporting was degraded on 30 January 2023 between 6:31 AM and 6:50 AM PST Pacific Time. During this period customers may have experienced latency loading data or may have been unable to access data in their Flex Insights dashboard. The issue has now been resolved and data is loading normally.
